official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands to the State of Oregon by and through its Department of Transportation.

summary.text: Requires airline tickets to show total charges for transportation and for taxes, under the internal Revenue Code. (Amends 26 4SC7275(a)).

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands to the State of Oregon by and through its Department of Transportation.
